Reviews.Title: It working and good.
Reviews.Author: mijeong kim
Reviews.Content: I installed this for my new shop. It has a great color view also great price for 8 cameras. I have a little problems for remote location access. So I gave a 3 stars but most of all I satisfied. I recommended this item if you are good to installed on the wall by yourself.
